name: Orbital Refueller
description:
Team Name DigitalCraft

DigitalCraft

pomop-cmamop

Paul Coolhard

Your station is falling Down to Earth.

To stabilize in orbit, it is required to deliver fuel from satellites to a space station. Avoid collisions between satellites and the station.

Gameplay instruments: W - to speed up the character. S - to slow down.

Mouse to set the direction of the motion vector.
